title: oru kaNamAyinum
sahitya:
oru kaNamAyinum maravEnE en uLLattaik-koLLai koNDa iraivanE unnai


anupallavi

  guruvum kula deivamum koNDa maNALanum gOvardhana giridhara gOpAla sAmi nIyE


caraNam    siriya vayadil ennaip-piriyamuDan kaip-paTri I\jIva nAthanAna pAvanAtItanE
arivu vandadu mudal Ashai nEsanAi unnai anbu shei mIrAvin inba maNALanE
